Geburtstag) is a German theatre director and intendant.Heinz Lukas- KindermannShort introduction on OpernFREUND == Life and career == Born in Münster, Lukas-Kindermann is the son of the Austrian theater scholar . He grew up in Vienna and studied at the University of Music and Performing Arts Vienna. He was then assistant director of Gustav Rudolf Sellner at the Deutsche Oper Berlin. Afterwards he became chief director of the opera at the Stadttheater Bielefeld and later opera director at the Theater Kiel, the Staatstheater Braunschweig, the Staatstheater NürnbergHeinz Lukas-Kindermann at Staatstheater Nürnberg as well as the Theater Dortmund.Nabucco at Staatstheater Nürnberg on Online Musik Magazin Lukas-Kindermann also worked at the Deutsche Oper am Rhein in Düsseldorf and Duisburg, the Wiener Staatsoper, the Volksoper Wien, the Opernhaus Zürich, the Staatstheater Hannover, the Berliner Festspiele, but also at the Teatro Nacional de São Carlos in Lisbon, the Savonlinna Opera Festival, the Vlaamse Opera in Antwerp, the Staatsoper Prague etc. From 1995 to 2004 Lukas-Kindermann was director of the ,The Magic Flute on Szenik.eu/de/Klassik where he co-founded among other things the Antikenfestspiele.
